title: Why am i getting packet loss spikes and high ping on lol?
body:
I have 80-170 ping and it says " attempting to reconnect" alot, anyone know why?
speed test:  [here](http://beta.speedtest.net/result/6398905245.png)
video: [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ptm92GwOefA&ab_channel=Dova)
Any help is appreciated:)

replies.body: Hmmmmm yea that does look like you're dealing with some packet loss. Let's double check using this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to be 100% sure first. Use the game logs from that game, and take a screenshot to post here for us to look over together!

So that 20-25% of packet loss is most likely the culprit here. Typically that kind of packet loss is happening somewhere along the road that your ISP is sending your connection, but our tech guys might still be able to help out. Reach out to them in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with the logs you used in that reader and you'll be in good hands there ^_^!
